items.title: Homework 2 (Practice) Released
items.body: Homework 2 is a list of practice problems and is not graded. No submission is required. Download: https://amessbee.github.io/310S26/resources/hw/hw2.pdf

items.title: Welcome to CS310/5102
items.body: Please join Slack at http://tiny.cc/slack310 and check LMS regularly for updates.

items.title: PollEv Registration
items.body: Register at PollEv.com/cs310 for in-class polls.

items.title: Worksheet 2 Solutions (Video)
items.body: Solutions to some problems on Worksheet 2 are discussed here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0wkItoE-ESjZ5WPp3HSR5lZVhfqXH4yW
